snippet: World number two Andy Murray used his full repertoire of clever passing shots and teasing lobs to disarm the world's fastest server, Sam Groth, and swiftly book a spot in the Australian Open third round on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: World number two Andy Murray used his full repertoire of clever passing shots and teasing lobs to disarm the world's fastest server, Sam Groth, and swiftly book a spot in the Australian Open third round on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Disarms Groth With Masterly Display
headline.main: Murray Disarms Groth With Masterly Display
